## isNamedFunction() function

Returns whether or not the given value is of type `Function` and is a named Function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isNamedFunction(o: any): boolean;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  o | any |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
